mapper.insert: insert into board(subject, contents, userid, user_user_no, disasterType, location) values(#{subject}, #{contents}, 'hong', 1, #{disasterType}, #{location})
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where post_no=${param1}
update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where post_no=${post_no}
mapper.select: select post_no, subject, userid, location, writedate, hit, popular from board where disasterType like '%${disasterType}%' order by post_no desc limit ${onePageRecord} offset ${offsetPoint}
